property.name: strBodyCopy
property.label: Body Copy
property.default: VentureCrowd has a strong network of partners that focus on curating impact investing opportunities and managing funds for seed stage and early stage ventures, as well as property funds and projects.

property.name: Investment_Tile_1_Body
property.label: Investment Tile 1 Body
property.default: Uniseed supports innovations that solve market problems and create a positive impact for our community. Uniseed invests over a broad range of technology sectors and has exited ten investments, to date. Uniseed invests in researchers, technologies and businesses that will change the world for the better.

property.default: Homecorp Property Group is an established leader in residential urban property development and master planned communities.Homecorp has developed, sold and completed 18 major residential housing projects, grossing more than $1.5 billion in sales.
